thumb.title: I wanted to create a monster design made up of emotions and i started with the anger monster!
thumb.description: I wanted to create a monster design made up of emotions. I started with the anger monster and, for some reason, I made a connection with maya technology. I'm thinking of using this monster somewhere in my game, but I need to find it without getting angry :) #MotivationMonday #gaming #art #fanart #anime #fish #monster #fishing #indiegame #unityhttps://store.steampowered.com/app/3690550/OHAYO_GIANTHOOK_Monster_Fishing_Adventure/?l=finnish
